title: Stuck at reconnect screen after skipping to stats post game
body: Any ideas on how to stomp this bug? After game finished, i waited a few seconds then clicked skip to stats cause it usually doesnt take more than 2 seconds to show them. Now the client has me in a ghost game that i can not seem to get myself out of from restarts and repair tool. I'm stuck in a damn loop here, pls help {{champion:245}}
